summary: A special manor, must have Dawnguard.
descriptionHtml:
Dawnguard is Required...I think, I do have a couple of flags and other itmes that are dawnguard items, so i am thinking it is required...Sorry I thought I posted this on here.

Also contains Nudity...

A special manor, that onced housed Dragon Hunters. Cpmplete with all you need. A library, and enchanting, and Alchemy stations. A kitchen with food storage. A nice swimming area, for relaxation. A war room with display cases and Mannequins. A master bedroom with a special hidden room for treasure. And a Court yard, with crafting and wood chopping, plus a little bath area.

Just a couple of tid bits, This house does work with My home is your home, but when with a follower, if you go out in the court yard, you will be somewhat glitched through the floor. The reason is I did not Nav mesh the courtyard, since it was outside. Plus the follower is not user friendly in it either.

There is a key in Bleakfalls Sanctum, where you retrieve the Dragonstone. And for ones who really want to just peak in, there is a pic of the side of the front porch, where a key is lying, or just type coc aaamanor.

A special door from Bleakfalls Sanctum, teleports you to the lab/ library area.

Hope you like this mod, and let me know what you think, I need some feedback.

changelog:
2.0
Changed the floor and ceiling a bit, fixed up the crafting chests, if you have anything, before the update, remove then download. You should know the drill.

Added Sandraniks Mannequins, so there is a male and female. Added extra mannequins, as a helmet bust there are 8.

More decorations, and fixes.

If you have any ideas that would be good, post them in the comments, and I will be glad to take it under consideration.
author: Jrew
